00027 #ifndef __SCENEMANAGER_H__
00028 #define __SCENEMANAGER_H__

00034 #include "omega/scene/Actor.h"
00035 #include "omega/scene/Light.h"

00037 namespace omega
00038 {
00039         class Renderer;
00040 namespace scene
00041 {
00043         class OUTILS_API SceneManager: public DynamicObject
00044         {
00045         public:
00046                 static const int MaxLights = 8;
00047 
00048         public:
00049                 SceneManager(omega::GpuManager* gpu): 
00050                   myGpuMng(gpu), 
00051                   myRoot(NULL),
00052                   myAmbientLightColor(0.3f, 0.3f, 0.4f, 1.0f) {}
00053 
00054                 void initialize();
00055 
00056                 GpuManager* getGpuManager();
00057                 SceneNode* getRootNode();
00058 
00059                 void setAmbientLightColor(const Color& value);
00060                 Color getAmbientLightColor();
00061 
00062                 void draw(const DrawContext& context);
00063                 void update(const UpdateContext& context);
00064                 bool handleEvent(const Event& evt, UpdateContext& context);
00065                 bool handleEvent(const Event& evt, DrawContext& context);
00066 
00067                 void addActor(Actor* actor);
00068                 void removeActor(Actor* actor);
00069 
00070                 void addRenderPass(RenderPass* pass, bool addToFront = false);
00071                 void removeRenderPass(RenderPass* pass);
00072 
00073                 Light* getLight(int num);
00074 
00075                 Renderer* getRenderer();
00076 
00077         private:
00078                 omega::GpuManager* myGpuMng;
00079                 SceneNode* myRoot;
00080 
00081                 Light myLights[MaxLights];
00082                 Color myAmbientLightColor;
00083 
00084                 List<Actor*> myActors;
00085                 List<RenderPass*> myRenderPassList;
00086 
00087                 Renderer* myDefaultRenderer;
00088         };
00089 
00091         inline GpuManager* SceneManager::getGpuManager() 
00092         { return myGpuMng; }
00093 
00095         inline SceneNode* SceneManager::getRootNode() 
00096         { return myRoot; }
00097 
00099         inline void SceneManager::setAmbientLightColor(const Color& value)
00100         { myAmbientLightColor = value; }
00101 
00103         inline Color SceneManager::getAmbientLightColor()
00104         { return myAmbientLightColor; }
00105 
00107         inline Light* SceneManager::getLight(int num)
00108         { return &myLights[num]; }
00109 
00111         inline Renderer* SceneManager::getRenderer()
00112         { return myDefaultRenderer; }
